NPC.name: Keliya
NPC.description: This harpy has a sort of mottled hair colour like an inexpert dye job to make her blonde as opposed to brunette. Her hair is neatly combed and she offers you a friendly smile. At her feet is an adding machine, assorted bags and merchandise and a sign saying 'friendly and approachable non dangerous shopkeeper', curious.
